name: Create Space
description: Create a new space with a given name. Spaces are isolated environments for organizing data, agents, tasks, and storage. Creates the directory structure: data/spaces/[space_name]/ with subdirectories for agents, tasks, tables, and storage.

space_name.description: Name of the space to create (lowercase, alphanumeric, underscores, hyphens)

description.description: Optional description of what this space is for

metadata.description: Optional metadata to store with the space (tags, owner, purpose, etc.)
